mapper.select: select distinct sys_menu.menu_id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.url, sys_menu.visible, ifnull(sys_menu.perms,'') as perms, sys_menu.target, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.order_num, sys_menu.create_time from sys_menu left join sys_role_menu on sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id left join sys_user_role on sys_role_menu.role_id = sys_user_role.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id where sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} and sys_menu.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and sys_menu.visible = 0 AND sys_role.status = 0 order by sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.order_num

select distinct sys_menu.menu_id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.url, sys_menu.visible, ifnull(sys_menu.perms,'') as perms, sys_menu.target, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.order_num, sys_menu.create_time from sys_menu left join sys_role_menu on sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id left join sys_user_role on sys_role_menu.role_id = sys_user_role.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id where sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} order by sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.order_num

select distinct sys_menu.menu_id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.url, sys_menu.visible, ifnull(sys_menu.perms,'') as perms, sys_menu.target, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.order_num, sys_menu.create_time from sys_menu where sys_menu.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and sys_menu.visible = 0 order by sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.order_num

select distinct sys_menu.perms from sys_menu left join sys_role_menu on sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id left join sys_user_role on sys_role_menu.role_id = sys_user_role.role_id where sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId}

select concat(sys_menu.menu_id, ifnull(sys_menu.perms,'')) as perms from sys_menu left join sys_role_menu on sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id where sys_role_menu.role_id = #{roleId} order by sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.order_num

SELECT sys_menu.menu_id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.order_num, sys_menu.url, sys_menu.target, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.visible, sys_menu.perms, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.remark, (SELECT sm.menu_name FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.menu_id = sys_menu.parent_id) parent_name FROM sys_menu where sys_menu.menu_id = #{menuId}
